scene_description_enriched: A bearded figure, likely representing God the Father, is depicted seated on a rainbow, surrounded by clouds. He holds a book in his left arm and a sword in his right hand, pointing upwards. His left hand also gestures towards a cluster of stars. The scene is framed by decorative cloud-like motifs and a border of stylized foliage or clouds.
scene_interpretation: The figure of God the Father, seated on a rainbow (a symbol of God's covenant with humanity, as seen in the story of Noah), holding a book (representing divine law or scripture) and a sword (symbolizing divine judgment or power), and gesturing towards stars (representing creation or divine order), strongly suggests a depiction of God as Creator and Judge.
